org.mmbase.servlet

Interface MMBaseStarter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttachmentServlet, BridgeServlet, DoveServlet, FileServlet, FrameworkFilter, HandleServlet, ImageServlet, JamesServlet, JumpersFilter, MMBaseServlet, Performance, RMIHandlerServlet, servdb, servflash, servjumpers, servscan, SimpleFormToMailServlet

    public interface MMBaseStarter
    Used in combo with MMBaseStartThread, which uses the methods of this interface to inform its starter about the results.
    Since:
    MMBase-1.7
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MMBase getMMBase()
      Returns the currently set MMBase object.
      void setInitException(javax.servlet.ServletException e)
      If something went wrong (an exception occured), the caller may is informed by a call to this method.
      void setMMBase(MMBase mmb)
      Set MMBase object after initializion, in the caller.

    • Method Detail

      • getMMBase

        MMBase getMMBase()
        Returns the currently set MMBase object.
        Returns:
        the MMBase instance or null.

      • setMMBase

        void setMMBase(MMBase mmb)
        Set MMBase object after initializion, in the caller.

      • setInitException

        void setInitException(javax.servlet.ServletException e)
        If something went wrong (an exception occured), the caller may is informed by a call to this method. (It may ignore it).
